channel.title: [317]Reset Commands
channel.description:
317, delta source.
I want to make a commands like: -ResetAtk -ResetStr -ResetDef But i know addSkillXP gives XP But what code will remove XP or set a certain level to 1. removeSkillXP doesn't work
Please post!

item.title: [317]Reset Commands
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

if(command.startsWith("reset")) { playerLevel[0] = 1; playerLevel[1] = 1; playerLevel[2] = 1; }

Try that.

Read full topic
